data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Zaghouan, Tunisia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zaghouan, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Zaghouan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 35 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Zaghouan, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Zaghouan, Tunisia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Zaghouan, Tunisia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Amazigh, Gafsa people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 53 believers in Zaghouan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Zaghouan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 53 believers in Zaghouan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
